description: Try our easy to follow Baked Rice Custard with Spiced Orange recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Baked Rice Custard with Spiced Orange
name: Baked Rice Custard with Spiced Orange Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: For spicy orange segments, using a small sharp knife, cut all 4 oranges into segments. Place into a bowl. Put extra sugar, 1/2 cup of water and cinnamon sticks into a saucepan. Scape seeds from vanilla bean and add to mixture with vanilla bean. Stir over medium low heat until sugar is dissolved and mixture comes to the boil. Reduce heat to low. Add oranges and simmer for 4 minutes. Cool.

Add oranges and simmer for 4 minutes. Cool.
